LanguageData.BloodCombinement.label: blood combinement
LanguageData.BloodCombinement.description: Harness pure willpower and evil thoughts to create a weak stone-like bloody brick at a butcher's table.
LanguageData.BloodRefinement.label: blood refinement
LanguageData.BloodRefinement.description: Build a blood altar that is used to create bloodcrete.
